titleStmt.title: The child-birth or womans lecture. That is: A lecture vpon Chap. 1. ver. 57, 58. of the holie Gospell according to Luke very necessarie to bee read and knowne of all young married and teeming women, and not vnprofitable for men of all sortes. By. Chr. H.
titleStmt.author: Hooke, Christopher.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Orwin, for Henry Hooke, and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard, by Raphe Iackson, at the signe of the Swanne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
